newsitem.title: USA: PRESS DIGEST - Washington Post business - Jan 21.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Washington Post business - Jan 21.

text.p: The Washington Post carried the following major business stories on January 21:
WASHINGTON - Banc One Corp of Columbus, Ohio announced it would buy First USA Inc, the country's fourth largest issuer of bank credit cards.

WASHINGTON - The chairman of the Surface Transportation Board, the agency that is likely to redraw the map of eastern railroading, says the board would prefer a negotiated settlement of the bitter battle for Conrail.

WASHINGTON - Bell Atlantic/Nynex Mobile begins offering a new digital wireless telephone service in the Washington-Baltimore area, a move that raises the stakes for competitors in one of the nation's fastest-growing markets for pocket phones.
